spell_tooltip.description: Your Travel Form movement speed while within a Battleground or Arena is increased by 20% and you always move at 100% movement speed while in Travel Form.

Wild Growth is now instant cast, and when you heal 6 allies with Wild Growth you gain Full Bloom. This effect has a 30 sec cooldown.

Full Bloom
Your next Wild Growth applies Lifebloom to all targets at 100% effectiveness. Lasts for 30 sec.
Efflorescence removes all snare effects from friendly targets when it heals and its Mana cost is reduced by 40%.

Rake the target for 61,648 Bleed damage and an additional 636,404 Bleed damage over 15 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Heals the target for 570,614 over 15 sec.
Rake, Rip, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 237,291 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.

Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 645,959 over 8 sec
   2 points: 968,938 over 12 sec
   3 points: 1.2 million over 16 sec
   4 points: 1.6 million over 20 sec
   5 points: 1.9 million over 24 sec
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Physical damage dealt by your abilities increased by 25%.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Guardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.
For 15 sec, all single-target healing also damages a nearby enemy target for 20% of the healing done.

Heals the target for 392,442 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 216,289.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 227,733 over 9 sec.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.
Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 30,558 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.5 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 40 yards for 1.6 million over 3.8 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 10,018 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 147,544.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 46,248. Lasts 15 sec.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 31,232 over 6 sec.
Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
When Lifebloom blooms, up to 3 targets within your Efflorescence are healed for 93,537.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.

Nourish
Regrowth decreases the cast time of your next Nourish by 33% and causes it to receive an additional 33% bonus from Mastery: Harmony. Stacks up to 3 times.

Grove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 57,178 over 7 sec.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 20,512 over 6 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

When you cast Starsurge, Rake, Shred, or Frenzied Regeneration you gain Heart of the Wild for 15 sec, once every 1 min.

 Heart of the Wild
Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Guardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage 25% faster, and your healing over time effects heal 5% faster.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.

Wrath and Shred transfer 100% of their damage and Starfire and Swipe transfer 50% of their damage into healing onto a nearby ally. 

This effect is increased by 200% while Heart of the Wild is active.

Consuming Clearcasting now causes your Regrowth to also cast Nourish onto a nearby injured ally at 60% effectiveness, preferring those with your heal over time effects.

 Nourish:
Heals a friendly target for 549,307.  Receives 300% bonus from Mastery: Harmony.

While your Lifebloom is on yourself, your periodic heals heal 10% faster.

While your Lifebloom is on an ally, your periodic heals on them have a 4% chance to cause it to bloom.
You may Lifebloom two targets at once, but Lifebloom's healing is reduced by 10%.

Rip and Rake damage has a chance to cause Bloodseeker Vines to grow on the victim, dealing 214,686 Bleed damage over 6 sec.

Wild Growth, Regrowth, and Efflorescence healing has a chance to cause Symbiotic Blooms to grow on the target, healing for 151,945 over 6 sec.

Multiple instances of these can overlap.

Damage and healing while in Cat Form increased by 3%.

Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.

Attacking from Prowl increases the chance for Shred, Rake, and Swipe to critically strike by 8% for 6 sec.

Casting Regrowth increases the chance for your periodic heals to critically heal by 8% for 10 sec.

Rip and Ferocious Bite damage increased by 5%.

Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom healing increased by 10%.
When you remove an effect with Soothe or Nature's Cure, gain a combo point and heal for 4% of your maximum health. If you are at full health an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
During Barkskin your movement speed is increased by 10% and every second flowers grow beneath your feet that heal up to 3 nearby injured allies for 19,234.
Your Regrowth's healing to yourself is increased by 35%.

Each active Bloodseeker Vine increases the damage your abilities deal by 2%.

Each active Symbiotic Bloom increases the healing of your spells by 2%.

When Bloodseeker Vines expire or you use Ferocious Bite on their target they explode in thorns, dealing 159,027 physical damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced above 5 targets.

When Symbiotic Blooms expire or you cast Rejuvenation on their target flowers grow around their target, healing them and up to 3 nearby allies for 23,831.
When Bloodseeker Vines or Symbiotic Blooms grow, they have a 20% chance to cause another growth of the same type to immediately grow on a valid nearby target.

Bloodseeker Vines increase the damage your abilities deal to affected enemies by 5%.

Symbiotic Blooms increase the healing your spells do to affected targets by 20%.

Rake the target for 60,565 Bleed damage and an additional 636,404 Bleed damage over 15 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Heals the target for 570,614 over 15 sec.
Rake, Rip, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 237,291 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.

Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 645,959 over 8 sec
   2 points: 968,938 over 12 sec
   3 points: 1.2 million over 16 sec
   4 points: 1.6 million over 20 sec
   5 points: 1.9 million over 24 sec
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

While in Cat Form, when you critically strike with an attack that generates a combo point, you gain an additional combo point. Damage over time cannot trigger this effect.

Mangle critical strike damage increased by 20%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Shift into Cat Form and increase your movement speed by 200%, reducing gradually over 5 sec.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Physical damage dealt by your abilities increased by 25%.
You retain Lycara's Teachings' bonus from your most recent shapeshift form for 5 sec after shifting out of it.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Guardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.
For 15 sec, all single-target healing also damages a nearby enemy target for 20% of the healing done.

Heals the target for 392,442 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 218,053.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 227,733 over 9 sec.
Protects a friendly target for 32 sec. Any damage taken will consume the ward and heal the target for 1.2 million over 10 sec.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.
Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 30,385 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.5 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 40 yards for 1.6 million over 3.8 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 10,018 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 150,002.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 46,001. Lasts 15 sec.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 31,232 over 6 sec.
Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
When Lifebloom blooms, up to 3 targets within your Efflorescence are healed for 93,537.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations and Ironbark's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 20,512 over 6 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

When you cast Starsurge, Rake, Shred, or Frenzied Regeneration you gain Heart of the Wild for 15 sec, once every 1 min.

 Heart of the Wild
Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Guardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage 25% faster, and your healing over time effects heal 5% faster.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.

Consuming Clearcasting now causes your Regrowth to also cast Nourish onto a nearby injured ally at 60% effectiveness, preferring those with your heal over time effects.

 Nourish:
Heals a friendly target for 530,062.  Receives 300% bonus from Mastery: Harmony.

While your Lifebloom is on yourself, your periodic heals heal 10% faster.

While your Lifebloom is on an ally, your periodic heals on them have a 4% chance to cause it to bloom.
You may Lifebloom two targets at once, but Lifebloom's healing is reduced by 10%.
You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target. Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 2 sec.

Damage and healing while in Cat Form increased by 3%.

Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.

Attacking from Prowl increases the chance for Shred, Rake, and Swipe to critically strike by 8% for 6 sec.

Casting Regrowth increases the chance for your periodic heals to critically heal by 8% for 10 sec.

Rip and Ferocious Bite damage increased by 5%.

Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom healing increased by 10%.
When you remove an effect with Soothe or Nature's Cure, gain a combo point and heal for 4% of your maximum health. If you are at full health an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
During Barkskin your movement speed is increased by 10% and every second flowers grow beneath your feet that heal up to 3 nearby injured allies for 19,234.
Your Regrowth's healing to yourself is increased by 35%.

Bloodseeker Vines and Symbiotic Blooms last 2 additional sec.

When a target afflicted by Bloodseeker Vines dies, the vines jump to a valid nearby target for their remaining duration.

When Bloodseeker Vines expire or you use Ferocious Bite on their target they explode in thorns, dealing 159,027 physical damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced above 5 targets.

When Symbiotic Blooms expire or you cast Rejuvenation on their target flowers grow around their target, healing them and up to 3 nearby allies for 24,611.
Your Swiftmend causes a Symbiotic Bloom to grow on the target for 6 sec.

Rake the target for 60,822 Bleed damage and an additional 636,404 Bleed damage over 15 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Heals the target for 570,614 over 15 sec.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 280,662 Arcane damage to the target, and 97,358 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Rake, Rip, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 237,291 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.

   5 points: 1.9 million over 24 sec
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 19,178 Nature damage and then an additional 263,791 Nature damage over 18 sec.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.

   2 points: 968,938 over 12 sec
   3 points: 1.2 million over 16 sec
   4 points: 1.6 million over 20 sec
   5 points: 1.9 million over 24 sec
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Physical damage dealt by your abilities increased by 25%.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Guardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.
For 15 sec, all single-target healing also damages a nearby enemy target for 20% of the healing done.

Heals the target for 392,442 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 212,118.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 227,733 over 9 sec.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.
Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 30,941 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.5 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 40 yards for 1.6 million over 3.8 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 10,018 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 146,008.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 45,012. Lasts 15 sec.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 31,232 over 6 sec.
Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
When Lifebloom blooms, up to 3 targets within your Efflorescence are healed for 93,537.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.

Nourish
Regrowth decreases the cast time of your next Nourish by 33% and causes it to receive an additional 33% bonus from Mastery: Harmony. Stacks up to 3 times.

Grove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 57,178 over 7 sec.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 20,512 over 6 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

When you cast Starsurge, Rake, Shred, or Frenzied Regeneration you gain Heart of the Wild for 15 sec, once every 1 min.

 Heart of the Wild
Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Guardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage 25% faster, and your healing over time effects heal 5% faster.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.

Wrath and Shred transfer 100% of their damage and Starfire and Swipe transfer 50% of their damage into healing onto a nearby ally. 

This effect is increased by 200% while Heart of the Wild is active.

Consuming Clearcasting now causes your Regrowth to also cast Nourish onto a nearby injured ally at 60% effectiveness, preferring those with your heal over time effects.

 Nourish:
Heals a friendly target for 530,857.  Receives 300% bonus from Mastery: Harmony.

While your Lifebloom is on yourself, your periodic heals heal 10% faster.

While your Lifebloom is on an ally, your periodic heals on them have a 4% chance to cause it to bloom.
You may Lifebloom two targets at once, but Lifebloom's healing is reduced by 10%.

Damage and healing while in Cat Form increased by 3%.

Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.

Attacking from Prowl increases the chance for Shred, Rake, and Swipe to critically strike by 8% for 6 sec.

Casting Regrowth increases the chance for your periodic heals to critically heal by 8% for 10 sec.

Rip and Ferocious Bite damage increased by 5%.

Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom healing increased by 10%.
When you remove an effect with Soothe or Nature's Cure, gain a combo point and heal for 4% of your maximum health. If you are at full health an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
During Barkskin your movement speed is increased by 10% and every second flowers grow beneath your feet that heal up to 3 nearby injured allies for 19,234.
Your Regrowth's healing to yourself is increased by 35%.

Each active Bloodseeker Vine increases the damage your abilities deal by 2%.

Each active Symbiotic Bloom increases the healing of your spells by 2%.

When Bloodseeker Vines expire or you use Ferocious Bite on their target they explode in thorns, dealing 159,027 physical damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced above 5 targets.

When Symbiotic Blooms expire or you cast Rejuvenation on their target flowers grow around their target, healing them and up to 3 nearby allies for 23,804.
When Bloodseeker Vines or Symbiotic Blooms grow, they have a 20% chance to cause another growth of the same type to immediately grow on a valid nearby target.

Bloodseeker Vines increase the damage your abilities deal to affected enemies by 5%.

Symbiotic Blooms increase the healing your spells do to affected targets by 20%.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
